meta.title: ECGC PO Computer Knowledge - Set 13 (PYQ Special)

questions.question: In the context of banking exams, what does MICR stand for?

Which communication mode allows data to flow in both directions but not simultaneously?
A program that translates Mnemonic codes (Assembly Language) into Machine Language is called an:
In MS Word, 'Gutter Margin' refers to:
options: Margin added to the binding side
